title: FriMi rewards user with Samsung Galaxy Watch4 devices
body_lines: FriMi, the fully-fledged digital banking experience powered by Nations Trust Bank, teamed up with its strategic partner Samsung to reward their loyal users through an exclusive promotion. The exciting giveaway of 2 Samsung Galaxy Watch4 devices was recently awarded to a lucky FriMian, Kanagarathnam Sanjeevan to enjoy with his loved one.

The competition was open for all FriMians who had made 5 FriMi transactions including bill payments, debit card transactions, LANKAQR payments, Fund transfers, and Credit Card payments, among others during the month of February.

FriMi inked a strategic partnership with Samsung Sri Lanka early last year (2021) to facilitate the payments of the loyal Samsung retailer network, ensuring they receive incentive payments conveniently and in real-time, among other benefits. The partnership included a co-branded FriMi-Samsung platinum debit MasterCard, offered to the retailers. The exclusive device partnership for this promotion builds on the close relationship the brands enjoy, uplifting the consumer experience.
